summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of certain portion of southeast quarter of northeast quarter of Section 16-24-4; Lots 3, 4 and 5, Block 2, Bonen's Addition; Lot 9, Block 1, Wild Rose Addition; west 5 feet of east 50th feet of north 75 feet of Lots 9 and 10, and west 17 feet of east 50 feet of south 25 feet of Lot 10, Block 31, Woodland Addition to Salmon Bay City; and the south 50 feet of Lot 9, Block 59, Gilman Park Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-331 and 17-260, respectively.
